My name is Jannes and I'm a 26-year-old junior developer with big dreams of becoming a great programmer. I've always had a natural curiosity for writing code, and I'm constantly honing my skills through hard work and dedication.

My journey in programming began back in 2019 when I enrolled in a bootcamp called Codaisseur. It was there that I learned the foundations of software development and gained valuable experience working on real-world projects. It was an intense and challenging experience, but I loved every minute of it.

But my passion for technology began long before that. As a child, I was always tinkering with and fixing computers, which sparked a lifelong interest in technology. I was always fascinated by the way things worked, and I loved the challenge of solving problems and figuring things out.

Now, as a junior developer, I'm determined to make a name for myself and build a successful career in the tech industry. I know that I still have a lot to learn, but I'm excited about the possibilities that lie ahead. With my natural curiosity and talent, I'm confident that I can achieve my dreams and become the great programmer that I know I can be.
